prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a spiral shell and long tentacles for arms.
Imagine a Pokémon that can hide in the ocean floor with a hard, protective shell.
Show me a rock-type Pokémon that resembles an ancient sea creature with sharp features.
Design a Pokémon that evolves from a small creature and becomes a giant aquatic beast.
Generate a mythical Pokémon known for its ability to control ocean currents and waves.
Give me a Pokémon that has a hard body and can withstand powerful attacks from opponents.
Make a Pokémon that thrives in oceanic habitats and has a calming, wise personality.
